The fancy looking ESRGAN is an acronym for Enhanced Super Resolution Generative Adversarial Network. There is a pre trained model in TensorFlow Hub called ESRGAN https tfhub. This model is trained on DIV2K Dataset on bicubically downsampled images on image patches of size 128 x 128Please read the paper https arxiv. We shall now get cracking with the implementation of this model.
